Package tuitions

Class Roster

java.lang.Object
tuitions.Roster
public class Roster extends Object
The Roster class used as the container for students. This class contains methods to perform several functions to the roster of students.
Author:
Tommy Cho

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      A getter for the number of students in the roster
      Returns:
      int of students in the roster

    • find

      private int find(Student student)
      A method to find a student and return which index they're in in the roster
      Parameters:
      student - Student who is being found
      Returns:
      int index of student if found, -1 otherwise

    • grow

      private void grow()
      A method to grow the list of students. The roster grows by 4 everytime a cap is reached.

    • add

      public boolean add(Student student)
      A method to add the student to the roster.
      Parameters:
      student - the student being added
      Returns:
      true if the student is added, false otherwise

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Student student)
      A method to remove a student from the roster.
      Parameters:
      student - the student being removed
      Returns:
      true if the student is removed, false otherwise

    • print

      public void print()
      A method to print the roster of students as is.

    • printByName

      public void printByName()
      A method to print the roster of students by order of alphabetical first name

    • printByPaymentDate

      public void printByPaymentDate()
      A method to print the roster of students by the date they paid Only prints students who have paid some amount already

    • calculate

      public void calculate()
      A method to calculate the initial tuition of a student who hasn't been set yet

    • payTuition

      public boolean payTuition(Student student, double paymentAmount, Date date)
      A method that updates a student's payment towards their tuition
      Parameters:
      student - Student that is paying their tuition
      paymentAmount - amount the student is paying in double form
      date - Date the student is paying on
      Returns:
      true if payment was successful, false otherwise

    • setStudyAbroad

      public boolean setStudyAbroad(Student student)
      A method that sets the study abroad status of an international student
      Parameters:
      student - Student who is studying abroad
      Returns:
      true if the setting was successful, false otherwise

    • setFinancialAid

      public int setFinancialAid(Student student, double financialAid)
      A method for the command to set financial aid of a resident student.
      Parameters:
      student - Student that is being granted financial aid.
      financialAid - amount they are awarded
      Returns:
      4 if successful, 3 if the student is part time (unsuccessful), 2 if the student already received it (unsuccessful), 1 if the student isn't a resident (unsuccessful) and 0 if the student is not found (unsuccessful)
